name: Panos Nicolau
story: Sotridis was born and raised in a small farming village in Greece. He always had a fascination with military tactics and strategy, and joined the Greek military as soon as he turned 18. His natural leadership abilities quickly propelled him through the ranks, and he now serves as a team leader in the OPFOR faction. He takes pride in his skillset and dedication to his country, and is always looking for ways to improve.
